projects.name: Travel Blog
projects.description: Explore India's diverse beauty on our travel website, meticulously crafted with HTML, CSS, and Javascript and react js . And with city profiles, weather, uncovering cultural treasures and historical landmarks. The travel blog project is to create a dynamic and visually appealing platform for users to explore various destinations.

projects.name: Port Scanner
projects.description: Developed a network port scanner using Python that identifies open ports on specified target IP addresses or hostnames. Utilized socket programming for establishing network connections and termcolor for enhanced terminal output readability. Implemented functionality to handle multiple targets and a user-defined range of ports.

projects.name: Academy Machine Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing (VAPT)
projects.description: is a cybersecurity process.  where weaknesses in a system are identified and exploited ethically to assess its security posture, aiming to enhance defenses.

experiences.description: Completed Pantech's online Java Full Stack web development internship, gaining proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ReactJS for both frontend and backend development. Skilled in crafting responsive user interfaces and collaborating effectively within teams.
